text: David Todd may refer to: * David Todd (architect) (1915–2008), American architect * David Todd (producer), American record producer * David Peck Todd (1855–1939), American astronomer * David B. Todd Jr. (c. 1932-1980), American surgeon * David Todd (haematologist) (1928–2017) ==See also== * *David Tod (1805–1868), politician
title: David Todd
